zxr10vswitch.name: zxr10vswitch
zxr10vswitch.contactinfo: Nanjing Institute of ZTE Corporation Postal: No.1 Zijinghua Rd. Yuhuatai District, Nanjing, China Tel: +86 25 52871677 E-mail: chen.wei3@mail.zte.com.cn Fax: +86 25 52871000
zxr10vswitch.description: This MIB Module provides Textual Conventions and OBJECT-IDENTITY Objects to be used by vswitch module.

zxr10vswitchIfTable.name: zxr10vswitchIfTable
zxr10vswitchIfTable.description: The description of zxr10 interface which is enable v-switch transfer mode. It is a list of v-switch interface entries.

zxr10vswitchIfEntry.name: zxr10vswitchIfEntry
zxr10vswitchIfEntry.description: A v-switch interface entry containing objects that v-switch interface infomation,such as: v-switch ifindex, v-switch iftype, v-switchtranstype.

zxr10vsiwtchIfIndex.name: zxr10vsiwtchIfIndex
zxr10vsiwtchIfIndex.description: The v-switch interface index which is the same as ifIndex defined in RFC1213 ifTable.

zxr10vswitchIfType.name: zxr10vswitchIfType
zxr10vswitchIfType.description: The interface type of this v-switch, which is the same as ifType defined in RFC1213 ifTable.

zxr10vswitchIfTransType.name: zxr10vswitchIfTransType
zxr10vswitchIfTransType.description: The v-switch interface transfer type, such as ip, vlan , or ip and vlan.

zxr10vswitchIfStatus.name: zxr10vswitchIfStatus
zxr10vswitchIfStatus.description: The v-switch interface status, ie the interface protocol status (up or down).

zxr10vswitchIfAddr.name: zxr10vswitchIfAddr
zxr10vswitchIfAddr.description: The IP address of this v-switch interface.

zxr10vswitchIfDesc.name: zxr10vswitchIfDesc
zxr10vswitchIfDesc.description: The description of this v-switch interface.

zxr10vswitchIfTableLastchange.name: zxr10vswitchIfTableLastchange
zxr10vswitchIfTableLastchange.description: The last time of the v-switch interface table changed.

zxr10vswitchVlanTable.name: zxr10vswitchVlanTable
zxr10vswitchVlanTable.description: The description of zxr10 vlan transfer table. It is a list of vlan transfer entries.

zxr10vsiwtchVlanEntry.name: zxr10vsiwtchVlanEntry
zxr10vsiwtchVlanEntry.description: A vlan transfer table entry containing objects that the interface vlan transfer configuration infomation,such as: input vlanid, inputInner vlanid, outputvlanid, outputInner vlanid, vlanrow status.

zxr10vswitchVlanIngressIfIndex.name: zxr10vswitchVlanIngressIfIndex
zxr10vswitchVlanIngressIfIndex.description: The interface that the vswitch vlan packet input.

zxr10vswitchVlanEgressIfIndex.name: zxr10vswitchVlanEgressIfIndex
zxr10vswitchVlanEgressIfIndex.description: The interface that the vsiwtch vlan packet output.

zxr10vswitchVlanEgressIntVlanid.name: zxr10vswitchVlanEgressIntVlanid
zxr10vswitchVlanEgressIntVlanid.description: The vswitch inner out put vlan index.

zxr10vswitchVlanVlanidRange.name: zxr10vswitchVlanVlanidRange
zxr10vswitchVlanVlanidRange.description: The vswitch vlan index range (default is 1).

zxr10vswitchVlandDirection.name: zxr10vswitchVlandDirection
zxr10vswitchVlandDirection.description: The vswitch vlan input output direction (default is uni-direction).

zxr10vswitchVlanRowStatus.name: zxr10vswitchVlanRowStatus
zxr10vswitchVlanRowStatus.description: The vswitch row status when it changes to invalid the row will be deleted.

zxr10vswitchVlanDesc.name: zxr10vswitchVlanDesc
zxr10vswitchVlanDesc.description: The vswitch row descrption, for nm01 using.

zxr10vswitchVlanTableLastchange.name: zxr10vswitchVlanTableLastchange
zxr10vswitchVlanTableLastchange.description: The last time of the v-switch vlan table changed.
